pageProps.content:
Experience

Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa: River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp.
The superior Kapama Southern Camp offers luxury 5-star accommodation, warm hospitality & friendly service in a tranquil setting. Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama Southern Camp is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time.

Stay

Kapama Southern Camp has 15 standard suites, 7 luxury villas & 3 luxury family villas.
Each air-conditioned standard suite has an en-suite bathroom with large windows & a private patio offering beautiful views over the bush.
Each luxury villa is 95 sqm in size & features a private lap pool, indoor & outdoor showers, espresso machine & a romantic fireplace open to the bath & bedroom.
The luxury family villas include 2 en-suite bedrooms each, making them ideal for families travelling with children. Each of these villas features an outdoor patio with a private lap pool.
The main lodge at Southern Camp consists of a relaxing lounge, open-plan dining room, sparkling swimming & outdoor boma where evenings are often spent around the crackling fire.

Activities

Kapama Southern Camp will take guests on morning & evening safari drives in open 4x4 vehicles. This amazing reserve can also be experienced on foot.
At Kapama, luxury & comfort go hand & hand. Invigorating spa treatments at the wellness spa will allow guests to relax in a remote & tranquil setting with nothing but the sounds of the wild in the background.
Hot air balloon safaris, photographic workshops & romantic sleep-outs can also be arranged at an additional cost.
